search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Scoop.it (scoopit.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Scoop.it is: [https://www.scoop.it/pricing](https://www.scoop.it/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Do you offer non-profit discounts?

Yes! We offer discounts for NGOs and registered charities. We also offer discounts for educational institutions. Please [contact us](https://info.scoop.it/edu-and-nonprofit) for a discount.

Can I switch to another plan?

Yes, absolutely. You can upgrade or downgrade to a different plan at any time.

Can I get a custom plan with more topics and channels?

Yes, we offer custom plans with any number of topics or channels as part of Scoop.it Enterprise.

Can I get a refund?

We allow you to cancel your subscription at any time. However, we cannot issue refunds for the time left in your subscription.

Can I pay by Credit Card, Wire Transfer or Check?

You can use a credit card to pay for any of our plans. We use Stripe's secure payment system and support all major credit cards. We only support wire transfer and payment by check for our enterprise solutions.

Cookies management panel

By allowing these third party services, you accept their cookies and the use of tracking technologies necessary for their proper functioning.  
  
Privacy policy

Preference for all services

Allow all cookies Deny all cookies

*   Mandatory cookies
    
    *   This site uses cookies necessary for its proper functioning which cannot be deactivated.  
        
        Allow Deny
        
*   APIs
    
    APIs are used to load scripts: geolocation, search engines, translations, ...
    
*   Advertising network
    
    Ad networks can generate revenue by selling advertising space on the site.
    
    *   Google Adwords (conversion) disallowed \- This service does not use cookie.  
        [Read more](https://tarteaucitron.io/service/googleadwordsconversion/ "Cookie detail for Google Adwords (conversion) on our site (new window)") \- [View the official website](https://www.google.com/settings/ads "View the official website Google Adwords (conversion) (new window)")
        
        Allow Deny
        
*   Audience measurement
    
    The audience measurement services used to generate useful statistics attendance to improve the site.
    
    *   Google Analytics (universal) disallowed \- This service can install 10 cookies.  
        [Read more](https://tarteaucitron.io/service/analytics/ "Cookie detail for Google Analytics (universal) on our site (new window)") \- [View the official website](https://policies.google.com/privacy "View the official website Google Analytics (universal) (new window)")
        
        Allow Deny
        
    *   Hubspot disallowed \- This service can install 6 cookies.  
        [Read more](https://tarteaucitron.io/service/hubspot/ "Cookie detail for Hubspot on our site (new window)") \- [View the official website](https://legal.hubspot.com/privacy-policy "View the official website Hubspot (new window)")
        
        Allow Deny
        
*   Comments
    
    Comments managers facilitate the filing of comments and fight against spam.
    
*   Other
    
    Services to display web content.
    
*   Social networks
    
    Social networks can improve the usability of the site and help to promote it via the shares.
    
    *   Facebook disallowed \- This service can install 6 cookies.  
        [Read more](https://tarteaucitron.io/service/facebook/ "Cookie detail for Facebook on our site (new window)") \- [View the official website](https://www.facebook.com/policy.php "View the official website Facebook (new window)")
        
        Allow Deny
        
    *   Linkedin disallowed \- This service does not use cookie.  
        [Read more](https://tarteaucitron.io/service/linkedin/ "Cookie detail for Linkedin on our site (new window)") \- [View the official website](https://www.linkedin.com/legal/cookie_policy "View the official website Linkedin (new window)")
        
        Allow Deny
        
    *   Twitter Widgets API disallowed \- This service does not use cookie.  
        [Read more](https://tarteaucitron.io/service/twitterwidgetsapiScit/ "Cookie detail for Twitter Widgets API on our site (new window)") \- [View the official website](https://support.twitter.com/articles/20170514 "View the official website Twitter Widgets API (new window)")
        
        Allow Deny
        
*   Support
    
    Support services allow you to get in touch with the site team and help to improve it.
    
    *   UserVoice disallowed \- This service does not use cookie.  
        [Read more](https://tarteaucitron.io/service/uservoice/ "Cookie detail for UserVoice on our site (new window)") \- [View the official website](https://www.uservoice.com/privacy/ "View the official website UserVoice (new window)")
        
        Allow Deny
        
*   Videos
    
    Video sharing services help to add rich media on the site and increase its visibility.
    
*   This website does not use any cookie requiring your consent.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes a free tier and subscription plans with annual and monthly payment options. Enterprise pricing is quote-based.
